short_summary: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires garments specific to the RCMP dress code consisting of tunics, jackets, and blazers.
description: Tender description that requires 2,025 Tunics Scarlet All Ranks (male & female), 160 jackets blue all ranks (male & female), 65 blazer regimental (male & female). The garment requirements must comply with RCMP specification G.S.1045-063, G.S.1045-358, G.S.1045-081, G.S.1045-335 dated 2023-03-22.

full_summary:
=============================================

### Tender: M7594-236293 NPP Tunics

**Title**: NATO Paint Pattern (NPP) Tunics
 **Reference Number**: WS4162159372
 **Solicitation Number**: WS4162159372
 **Publication Date**: August 24, 2023
 **Tender Closing Date**: September 14, 2023 14:00:00 (local time)

### Tender Details

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) has a requirement for a firm quantity of:

* 2,025 Tunics Scarlet All Ranks
* 160 jackets blue all ranks
* 65 blazer regimental

The requirement includes options as well as special orders. All goods must be Canadian-made in accordance with Article 503.4 (b) of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

### Proposal Evaluation

The proposal will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price. The selected bidder will be required to provide a detailed proposal that meets the specific requirements outlined in this tender.

### Contact Information

Ava Parsian, Contracting Officer
 Phone: [None]
 Email: ava.parsian@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
 [website](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17259982?extsite=MTcyNTk5ODJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Terms and Conditions

This tender will occur in two phases:

1.  **Expression of Interest**: Interested bidders will submit an expression of interest to participate in the project.
2.  **Solicitation**: The selected bidder will receive a solicitation with specific details of the requirement.

Canada reserves the right to modify, change, or terminate this project at its sole discretion.

### Notice and Procurement Details

*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Procurement Region**: Ottawa, Canada

### Contract Information

*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: November 1, 2024
*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

Please note the bid is closed, and awarded contracts are valid. This post is for historical documentation purposes. You can not submit bids for closed tenders. 

Submit historical and external content to [external-content@endfuse
